amendment.description: Amendment sought to give the EPA the authority to regulate the emissions of offshore drilling support vessels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to direct emission sources from the Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) to title I of the Clean Air Act, ensuring that the vessels often responsible for the majority of the OCS's emission sources are not left unregulated.
